name: DevTape
description:
- Our team's entry for Mini Jame Gam #16 -

As a character from an unfinished game, you're curious about the outside world.

It's been days your creator locked you inside this small space, yet the code is far from done.

Show him you don't deserve to be stuck in here! Ignore his orders and find the way out.

To break or not to break the rules, that is the question.

* WARNING : Just like our characters's story, our game isn't perfect due to lack of time. Let's just say we broke that rule, shall we? /wink *

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[ How to play ]

A : Move to the left

D : Move to the right

Space : Jump

Mouse : 

Left click on an item to apply tape and stuck it to the screen. 

Left click on a stuck item to remove the tape and free it.

P- Pause/Settings

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[ Our team ]

Yann Dupont - Game design, programming, art

Alexis Shan Yan - Game design, programming, writing

Bastien Dacqui - Game design, programming, level design

Annie Abhay - Game design, programming, writing,  sound design

All code and assets were created during the 48 hours of Jame Gam!
